name: Captain Proton's Pickle
description:
x =shoot, 

z =to shoot spreadshot if you got more than 1pickup.

the more pickups the stronger spreadshot.

10 pickups = ekstra life (1UP), or xpoints if you got all 4 hearts.

it will reset back to zero after 10 picups.

arrow keys to ¨move
